name: The Wacky World of Eye-eye
description:
Come and join the wacky world of Eye-eye by traversing through 4 stages.

The controls for the game are simple:

  • WASD, Arrow keys or left joystick for movement.
  • Button 1 (for 3rd party conroller), Button A (for XBox Controller) and Spacebar (for keyboard) to jump.
